title: The Charm Necklace
description: "Whether by choice or not, being left hurt like hell, burned like something you've never felt before."Skylar Medina has never asked for much - just to marry the man she loves and create the family she's always dreamed of with him. But when Michael is killed in a car accident, she becomes consumed with rage and despair. In the year following Michael's death, Skylar must face her cruel and unbarring reality. As she navigates her feelings, her destructive tendencies, and the web of complicated relationships with friends and family, she finds guidance in places she'd never expect.Will Skylar have the strength to let love in again? Or will she let anger and grief destroy her?This book contains some sailor-worthy language, sexy scenes, and deals with the darker sides of death, grief, beliefs, love, and anger.
author: Lauren Marie Lopp
